name: Time Scale (Eschyles)
description:
!PLAY IN VERY HIGH if you can, lights are important!

Hello there. Here is  our game : We decided to call it Time Scale, because that is the very mechanic that we didnt managed to implement.

Aaaaand also because it's a collision between two era; the space traveller crash himself in a strange city, on a arsh desert planet, it's look like they were in the middle of the bronze era... But they are all gone.

We of course, did not had the time to do everything we wanted to do, but we still manage to pull up with something we all can be proud of.

Before you can start, here are the controls:

Z,Q,S,D or the key arrows : movement.

Clic or ctrl on a net activate the grab. (very useful, but it's quite bugged... sorry, just use the Echap button to respawn and try to not moving when using the grab.)

you can grab some cristal, with the left clic or the E key.

I hope you will like it!

<3

Credits to Hippolyte Desfonds, Mathieu Demany, Augustin Liglet and Hugo Wehrlé
